questionsElleft.text: WHAT KIND OF WEBSITES DO YOU SPECIALIZE IN?
questionsElleft.hiddenText: I specialize in landing pages and elegant multi-page websites without a registration system.

questionsElleft.text: HOW CAN I ORDER A WEBSITE FROM YOU?
questionsElleft.hiddenText: You can contact me using the contact information from the link above or by using the contacts at the top of the page

questionsElleft.text: WHAT TECHNOLOGIES DO YOU USE FOR YOUR WEBSITES?
questionsElleft.hiddenText: What technologies do you use for your websites?

questionsElleft.text: CAN I REQUEST TO IMPROVE AN EXISTING SITE?
questionsElleft.hiddenText: Yes, there is such a possibility

questionsElright.text: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO CREATE A WEBSITE?
questionsElright.hiddenText: The time depends on the needs of your project, on average from 7 to 14 working days

questionsElright.text: CAN YOU MAKE CARDS FOR WILDBERRIES?
CAN YOU CREATE A WEBSITE DESIGN?
questionsElright.hiddenText: Yes, there is such an opportunity as an additional service

questionsElright.text: WHAT IF I DON'T LIKE THE RESULTING SITE?
questionsElright.hiddenText: Do not worry, during the implementation of the site we will keep in touch and coordinate the details of the project
